definition: a pernicious and malign influence that is hard to get rid of, to infect with a canker
details:
noun
- a pernicious and malign influence that is hard to get rid of
= synonyms: pestilence
- an ulceration (especially of the lips or lining of the mouth)
= synonyms: canker sore
- a fungal disease of woody plants that causes localized damage to the bark
verb
- to infect with a canker
- to become infected with a canker
